Room.Name: Emerald Fountain
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a fountain which is completely composed of emeralds.
Room.LongDescription: This fountain is a place for both young and old crystallines to relax and be entertained. The fountain itself illuminates the entire area in a relaxing green glow. The water which is sprayed into the air is instantly shaped into beautiful designs which hold their form for a few seconds and then fall towards the ground in millions of tiny dew drops.
